channel.title: Wood on Jaka Pribošek
channel.description: Recent content in Wood on Jaka Pribošek

item.title: LED Sign
item.description: I’ve made this LED display for a friend of mine, who happens to be a big football fan. A stand was carved out of spruce with a 6mm ballnose mill. The stock material has been mount inclined 20° on the CNC while the pocket was curved. The display is made out of plexi glass, engraved with 60° V-cutter, dived 0.5mm in material, with 0.75mm pitch. Underneath the plexiglass, there are 6 green LEDs, secretly placed in the pocket in the stand.
